basics.name: Mark Sabouni
basics.label: FinTech Product Manager
basics.summary: Driven by a passion for leveraging technology to deliver transformative outcomes, I bring expertise in product design, project management, and software development. With a proven track record in leading cross-functional teams, I excel at driving productivity gains and spearheading complex technological initiatives. I thrive in conceptual discussions, navigating challenges with perseverance and focus to deliver exceptional, client-centered products.

highlights: Led the product management effort for the integration platform resulting in a highly responsive, resilient, and reliable application for client and partner integrations.
Improved speed to market by 53%, converting a monolithic application into micro services using cloud-native solutions.
Introduced important security features like SSO and OIDC for 3rd Party app connections and reduced user overhead to open accounts
Led a tech transformation program to scale the tech stack and outpace the demands of clients and the business.
Implemented agile methodologies to improve organizational efficiency, transparency, communication.
Coordinated project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality software.
Received 'Exceptional' year-end performance rating, highlighting success in leading multiple cross-functional teams.
Drove a 400% increase in development team productivity by creating development tools and frameworks to support CI/CD best practices.
Successfully implemented Auth0 authentication and authorization platform to secure web applications and APIs.

courses: Inheritance and Data Structures in Java

education.institution: Wharton School of Business @ University of Pennsylvania
